title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Kuldar Leement
raw_text: Cover Art  Homecoming    Kuldar Leement is a twenty-seven-year-old concept artist. He studied technical drawing and general building for three years at the Kehtna Economy and Technology School. He then studied graphic design at the Tartu Art School before becoming employed by Tabasco Ad Agency, where he is an illustrator.
text:
Cover Art
Homecoming
Kuldar Leement is a twenty-seven-year-old concept artist. He studied technical drawing and general building for three years at the Kehtna Economy and Technology School. He then studied graphic design at the Tartu Art School before becoming employed by Tabasco Ad Agency, where he is an illustrator.
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Homecoming by Kuldar Leement
